you need a zone file, something that identifies your domain and its hosts.
Okay, how would I do this?:
http://pastebin.ca/245695 Thats whats inside the file above.
Now either upload a hosts file (max 5 MB): what does this mean?
you don't have a hosts file, so just ignore that part.
Once created, where does the file go?
/etc/bind/, and then you edit /etc/bind/named.conf.local and add a line there that refers to your file.
